author: Pamela Rambo Sexton
text: I am looking for examples and insight from cities/counties who have ever issued an RFP for a complete audit of (any or all of) their organization’s utility accounts (natural gas, electricity, water, solid waste/recycling, telecom) for both verification that all accounts/meters are actually tied to municipal assets and that charges were at the appropriate rates.   I’m particularly interested if anyone has negotiated a contact to complete such work where compensation was determined on a cost recovery basis.
title: RPF for utility account auditing
